subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Magic won for the 10th time in 12 games and did not have to contend with the Bulls’ All-Star guard Derrick Rose, who injured his right hip in the first quarter.
snippet: The Magic won for the 10th time in 12 games and did not have to contend with the Bulls’ All-Star guard Derrick Rose, who injured his right hip in the first quarter.
